moves.name: Fire Fang
moves.description: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. It may also make the target flinch or leave it burned.

moves.name: Thunder Fang
moves.description: The user bites with electrified fangs. It may also make the target flinch or leave it with paralysis.

moves.name: Horn Attack
moves.description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed horn to inflict damage.

moves.name: Growl
moves.description: The user growls in an endearing way, making the opposing team less wary. The foes' Attack stats are lowered.

moves.name: Defense Curl
moves.description: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.

moves.name: Bulldoze
moves.description: The user stomps down on the ground and attacks everything in the area. Hit Pokémon's Speed stat is reduced.

moves.name: Rapid Spin
moves.description: A spin attack that can also eliminate such moves as Bind, Wrap, Leech Seed, and Spikes.

moves.name: Knock Off
moves.description: The user slaps down the target's held item, preventing that item from being used in the battle.

moves.name: Rollout
moves.description: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes stronger each time it hits.

moves.name: Magnitude
moves.description: The user looses a ground-shaking quake affecting everyone around the user. Its power varies.

moves.name: Slam
moves.description: The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, etc., to inflict damage.

moves.name: Fury Attack
moves.description: The target is jabbed repeatedly with a horn or beak two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Assurance
moves.description: If the target has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack's power is doubled.

moves.name: Scary Face
moves.description: The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly reduce its Speed stat.

moves.name: Earthquake
moves.description: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes those around it.

moves.name: Giga Impact
moves.description: The user charges at the target using every bit of its power. The user must rest on the next turn.
